sent.orig: The appearance of CIMS(Computer Integrated Manufacturing System)is based on CIM(Computer Integrated Manufacture).
sent.trans: 计算机集成制造系统(CIMS:Computer Integrated Manufacturing System)的出现是以计算机集成制造(CIM:Computer Integrated Manufacture)这一概念为基础的。

sent.orig: Self-efficacy (SE) is being applied into computer use, which was defined as computer self-efficacy (CSE).
sent.trans: 计算机自我效能感(computer self-efficacy,CSE)是自我效能感理论在计算机培训、计算机辅助技术使用等行为活动中的应用。

sent.orig: One of the important applications on Computer Assisted Instruction (CAI) is Computer-based Testing.
sent.trans: 计算机辅助教学CAI(ComputerAssistedInstruction)的一个重要应用是计算机辅助测验CBT(Computer-BasedTesting)。

sent.orig: CTI is new developing computer and communication technology.
sent.trans: 计算机电话集成(CTI-Computer Telephony Integration)是一门新兴的计算机与通信技术。

sent.orig: Diagial computer: Computer which uses discrete numbers to represent and manipulate data. See Analog computer.
sent.trans: 数字：用来代表一特定数量的记号或符号。它可以单独一个或联合同集的其他的数字。例如，在十进制系统中，数字是指0到9中的任何一个符号。
